snippet: A student who left a noose hanging from a tree at Duke University has been disciplined but can return to campus next semester and will not face criminal charges.
abstract: Duke University says student who hung noose from campus tree has been disciplined but will be allowed to return next semester without facing criminal charges; unnamed student had apologized for prank, saying he did not grasp historical context of lynchings in South.
lead_paragraph: A student who left a noose hanging from a tree at Duke University has been disciplined but can return to campus next semester and will not face criminal charges.

headline.main: North Carolina: Investigation Into Noose at Duke Ends
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Investigation Into Noose Ends
